Title: Pharmacokinetics of Cromolyn and Ibuprofen in Healthy Elderly Volunteers.

Sentece: Following breath-controlled inhalation, the amount of SCG excreted in urine was significantly greater than after conventional inhalation (2.22 +/- 0.61 mg vs. 1.63 +/- 0.59 mg, p < 0.001).
Title: Lung deposition after electronically breath-controlled inhalation and manually triggered conventional inhalation in cystic fibrosis patients.
Name: Cromoglicic acid

Sentece: Following breath-controlled inhalation, the amount of SCG excreted in urine was significantly greater than after conventional inhalation (2.22 +/- 0.61 mg vs. 1.63 +/- 0.59 mg, p < 0.001).
Title: Lung deposition after electronically breath-controlled inhalation and manually triggered conventional inhalation in cystic fibrosis patients.
Name: Cromoglicic acid

Sentece: The absorption half-life for SCG following breath-controlled inhalation was significantly shorter when compared with conventional inhalation (78 +/- 23 min vs. 107 +/- 29 min; p < 0.01), suggestive of a more peripheral deposition for the former.
Title: Lung deposition after electronically breath-controlled inhalation and manually triggered conventional inhalation in cystic fibrosis patients.

Sentece: An early peak concentration of sodium cromoglycate occurred in the plasma, thereafter the plasma concentration declined mono- or bi-exponentially with a terminal T1/2 of approximately 100 minutes in both patients and normal subjects.
Title: Respiratory tract deposition of sodium cromoglycate is highly dependent upon technique of inhalation using the Spinhaler.
Name: Cromoglicic acid

Sentece: Following inhalation without and with a noseclip, no statistically significant difference was seen in the amount of SCG excreted in urine (0.9 +/- 0.4 mg vs. 1.0 +/- 0.5 mg; p = 0.402) and absorption half-life (93 +/- 25 min vs. 113 +/- 36 min; p = 0.083).
Title: Does wearing a noseclip during inhalation improve lung deposition?
Name: Cromoglicic acid

Sentece: Seven atopic asthmatic subjects (age 25 +/- 2 yrs) inhaled dry powder SCG from a Spinhaler on separate occasions at three flow rates, maximum (V1), 100 l.min-1 (V2), and 50 l.min-1 (V3), or placebo, according to a double-blind structured study.
Title: Inhalation rate of sodium cromoglycate determines plasma pharmacokinetics and protection against AMP-induced bronchoconstriction in asthma.
